questionList.question: Are the games fair?
questionList.answer: All games on Slotsbet are 100% fair.

questionList.question: What should I do if I have forgotten my password?
questionList.answer: You can easily create a new password. Just click the Forgot Password link in the Sign in form. Then we will send an email that will direct you to a new link. There you will create a new password and log in to your account.

questionList.question: Can I close my account?
questionList.answer: Of course. Please contact Customer Support in online chat and give a brief explanation to why you want to close your account.

questionList.question: I didn't receive a confirmation email. What should I do?
questionList.answer: Check your promotions, spam or junk folder and any tabs in your inbox. If there you did not find the letter either, please contact support via online chat or email.
